Iniesta: "I know what it means to play here and the responsibility of being a captain. To have played for this club is amazing. For me, the best club in the world."

"I want to thank the club and La Masia, who I am today, is thanks to the club."

"Thanks to my teammates and the people who have accompanied me every day, they made me be better."

"It's been an honor to have shared so many magical moments with Messi. There's no one like Leo. For me as a teammate, sharing those moments have been unique."

"I'd like to be remembered as a great football player and as a great person."

"It's been a dream come true, lots of titles, important moments throughout my career. I am very happy to have played for this club. I am proud."

"I've talked to many people. I have tried to be honest with myself and I decided this year is my last."

"Not winning the Ballon d'Or, does it bother me? No it does not, what I think is that respect is more important than a Ballon d'Or."

"Yes I'm leaving, but Barça will continue to keep on winning."

"I was 12 years old when I came here, it took me a while to fit in."

"Different coaches throughout my career? I remember all of them, and I want to thank them."

"Come back to Barça in the future? It's too soon to talk about that, we have to finish this season with the double."

恩尼斯達正式宣佈於季尾離隊!

新聞會內容：
“大家下午好。開這次新聞發布會，我是想告訴大家，這將是我在巴塞的最後一個賽季。這是個深思熟慮後的決定。”小白開門見山，並且聲音變得哽咽了起來。

“我在巴塞22年，我知道成為巴塞球員意味着什麼。巴塞是我心中的世界最佳球隊。我知道，年複一年為巴塞效力，需要怎樣的要求。我知道，出任巴塞隊長意味着什麼。我要對自己和俱樂部誠實，我的時代本賽季要結束了。”小白繼續說道。

“我當然想過在巴塞退役，但前提是我必須感覺自己是個有用的人，我要很重要，我要是主力。”小白繼續說道，“這一天對我很艱難，因為我一輩子都在這裏，要說再見太難了。但我知道生活的鐵律，未來會變得越來越難。如果我讓巴塞處于艱難境地，我不會原諒自己。”小白漸漸流下了眼淚，甚至開始抽泣。
